name: Crazy Chicken Shooting 18
description:
Crazy Chicken Shooting 18 is the real life hunting game on mobile devices! It takes you to the real crazy chicken shooter simulator and wings shooting experience with a lot of chicken in America. This is one of the most popular chicken shooting and wings hunting adventures in the 3 jungles. We bring you to the extreme chicken shoot adventure in a real safari jungle, island and in the mountains where you can hunt chickens.
Best Game Features

> Stunning chickens and high-quality 3D graphics
> Realistic controls for best hunt & shoot experience
> 10 exciting and challenging hunting levels
> Best sniper hunter experience by shooting chickens in North America.
> Modern sniper Rifle with scope to zoom in and zoom out
